alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 11 at 4:48PM EDT until September 12 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, including the following areas, Hartford, Tolland and Windham. Portions of Massachusetts, including the following areas, Bristol, Essex, Norfolk, Middlesex, Plymouth, Suffolk and Worcester Counties. Portions of Rhode Island, including the following areas, Bristol, Kent, Newport, Providence and Washington Counties, excluding Block Island. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
